text: Streaky the Super-Cat is a fictional superhero pet appearing in American comic books published by DC Comics. The character was created by Otto Binder and Jim Mooney, first appearing in Action Comics #261 (1960). == Fictional character biography == It is Supergirl's pet cat who gained incredible powers through exposure to X-Kryptonite; such as flight, super-strength, super-speed, invulnerability, and enhanced vision abilities. His distinctive mark is a lightning bolt in his fur running along both sides. He's also a member of the Legion of Super-Pets, alongside other super-powered animals such as Krypto, Beppo and Comet.
